title: Got two T206 Thebos; one has to go
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Got two T206 Thebos; one has to go
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Anonymous
Hello Everyone, 







I just bought this SGC50 Thebo Southern Leaguer from a member in a group of cards; I already had an ungraded one so one of them has got to go. I sold the ungraded one on eBay last week, but the customer returned it because he thought it might be trimmed. He was hoping to get it graded as a PSA 5 or better. The card measures fine there are no marks, scratches, or paper loss and the corners are decent. The print on the back of the card is a little off centered, but so is the graded one. I don't see any bat ears or signs of tampering, but I could be wrong. I'm including scans of both cards and prices and I will keep them listed here until Monday. I only want to sell one of them, and since they are both nice cards I don't care which one I keep. If they don't sell I will put one of them for sale on eBay next week.







SGC50 Price SOLD!







[IMG]http://i100.photobucket.com/albums/m10/northviewcats/003-50.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i100.photobucket.com/albums/m10/northviewcats/005-39.jpg[/IMG]







Ungraded Price $95.00







[IMG]http://i100.photobucket.com/albums/m10/northviewcats/001-48.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i100.photobucket.com/albums/m10/northviewcats/002-43.jpg[/IMG]







Nice looking cards. Emails take precedence over posts. I will pay the postage, Paypal add 3%.







Thanks,







Joe
